shoe_name: New Balance Fresh Foam More v3
pros: Insanely soft underfoot; Efficient stride; True to size; Accommodates wide feet; Stable platform; Should last a lot of miles; Max cushioned; No break-in; Good lockdown
cons: Runs warm; Feels a bit heavy; Grip is subpar on loose terrain
RR_verdict: The New Balance Fresh Foam More is a maximalist daily trainer that amazes me with its cushy and impact-absorbing ride! It's on the superlatives of comfort and I just love it for long runs and recovery days. Apart from its uber plush construction, what sets it apart from other max-cushioned shoes is that it's velvety smooth in its ride. It rolls me through my gait effortlessly and seamlessly.
awards: Top 22% in road running shoes, Top 7% in New Balance running shoes, Top 28% most popular running shoes
